title: WL Martin Plan 24460
summary: Side-by-side duplex with mirror-image units, each offering 3 bedrooms and modern amenities.
description: Plan 24460 provides investment-ready duplex living with two complete 1,600 sqft units under one roof. Each side features its own entrance, garage, and private outdoor space while sharing a common wall for construction efficiency. Perfect for multi-generational living, rental income, or live-in owner scenarios. The mirror-image layout simplifies construction and maximizes cost-effectiveness.
features: Open concept living in each unit
